last_phrase: In conclusion, it is important to note that while magnetic treatment can have numerous benefits, it should be approached with caution and under the guidance of a knowledgeable practitioner. Care must be taken to avoid any harmful effects, such as irritating delicate patients or causing antipathy. Medications may be used in conjunction with magnetic treatment, but only under specific circumstances. It is also important to monitor any resulting crises and their effects on the patient, and to differentiate between different types of spasms.
